Name: (P51) IMU Orientation
checklistText:
(P51/P53) IMU Orientation Determination

	CMC - on (req)
	ISS - on (req)
	SCS - on (desired)

Panel 7:
	LOGIC 2/3 PWR - on (up) (req if no SCS)
	Opt - on (req, P51)
	COAS - calib (req, P53)
	Att Cont (req)


	Total Att Disp (req)

Panel 2, 140:

	1 Key V37E 51E/53E

		Poss PROG alarm
	
	2 FL V50 N25
		00015 (trgt acq)

	a. Desired att cont mode

		Mnvr to acq tgts, if necessary
	
Panel 2, 140:
		PRO
		If P51 go to 3
		If P53 go to 4

	or b. To coarse align IMU to SC axes
		ENTR (when att acpt)
		V41 N22 (coarse align)
			R, P, Y		000.00 DEG
			NO ATT lt - on, then out
				Recycle 2

		(R53, Sighting Mark Routine)

	3 FL V51 (please mrk)

Panel 122:
	OPT ZERO - OFF
	OPT MODE - MAN
	Ctr trgt in SXT
	MARK (on trgt), go to 6

	(R56, Alternate LOS Sighting Mark Routine)

Panel 2, 140:
	4 FL V06 N94
		SA			XXX.XX DEG
		TA			XX.XXX DEG

	Accept	PRO
	Reject	Key V24E
		Load desired SA & TA


	5 FL V53 (please mrk)
		RHC - ctr trgt in COAS reticle

		ENTR, go to 6

	6 FL V50 N25
		00016 (term mrks)

	Accept	PRO

Panel 122:
	Reject	If P51, MARK REJ pb - push
		Return to 3


Panel 2, 140:
		If P53, ENTR, return to 5

	7 FL V01 N71
		Trgt code		000XX

		Accept	PRO
		

			Poss OPR ERR
				Recycles disp


	Reject	Key V21E
		Load trgt code

	For trgt 2 (trgt code â‰  00)
		P51, return to 3
		P53, return to 4

	8 FL V06 N88 (planet only)
		X, Y, Z		.XXXXX

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Key V25E
			Load desired data

		For trgt 2
			P51, return to 3
			P53, return to 4

			(R54, Sighting Data Display Routine)

	9 FL V06 N05
		Sighting angle diff	XXX.XX DEG

		Accept	PRO
		Reject	Key V32E, return to 2

	10 FL V37
		Key XXE

	11 If P51 and no P52
		Opt Pwr Down
